class.name: GLTFPhysicsBody
class.description: Represents a physics body as defined by the [code]OMI_physics_body[/code] GLTF extension.

method.name: from_dictionary
method.description: Creates a new GLTFPhysicsBody instance by parsing the given [Dictionary].

method.name: from_node
method.description: Create a new GLTFPhysicsBody instance from the given Godot [CollisionObject3D] node.

method.name: to_dictionary
method.description: Serializes this GLTFPhysicsBody instance into a [Dictionary].

method.name: to_node
method.description: Converts this GLTFPhysicsBody instance into a Godot [CollisionObject3D] node.

members.member: The type of the body. Valid values are "character", "kinematic", "rigid", "static", and "trigger".
The mass of the physics body, in kilograms. This is only used when the body type is "rigid".
